All that Jazz
 




Carlos Boozer points the way to a 1-0 series lead.  (Getty Images)



      
    

    

      
      The Warriors and Jazz are determined to produce exciting games. Utah outlasts Golden State 116-112 in a barnburner, keyed by a late 
      putback by Carlos Boozer. In Detroit, the Pistons roll 108-87 and cruise to a 2-0 lead.
    

  
 Related Links:• DET-CHI: Pistons | Bulls | Skiles laments | Defense | Mejia: 10 | Hey!&#
 149; Utah G Fisher misses Game 1 | Preview | Series | Warriors | Jazz• Bracket | Experts | Rankings |  Duncan, Nash | LeBron postgame


 


 

 





 Red Wings finish off Sharks, headed to Western finals


    

      
      Mikael Samuelsson scores 
      twice and Dominik Hasek saves 28 shots as the Red Wings eliminate the 
      Sharks with a 2-0 victory in Game 6. Next up for Detroit: Anaheim.
    

  
• Backhand Shots | Series | Bracket | Experts | Hey!


 

 





 Power Rankings: Myriad mishaps costing Gibbs drivers


    

      
      A few breaks and 2007 might belong to Joe Gibbs Racing, not Hendrick 
      Motorsports. Solid runs 
      by Tony Stewart and Denny Hamlin are falling just short, 
J. Darin Darst says.
